components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays To Telenor Network in Pakistan

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Telenor Network in Pakistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays To Tigo Network in Chad

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Tigo network in Chad. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Tigo network in Chad. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Tigo network in Chad. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Tigo network in Chad. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to SMS to the Tigo network in Chad. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: The Vivacom network in Bulgaria is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 August 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 30 August 2023 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Vivacom handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

incident_updates.body: The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 30 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 30 August 2023 at 18:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three UK is conducting a series of planned maintenance from 30 August 2023 at 18:30 PDT until 02 September 2023 at 10:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK customers

Impacted Products: Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match
Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

30 August 2023 at 19:00 PDT until 31 August 2023 at 01:00 PDT
31 August 2023 at 19:00 PDT until 01 September 2023 at 01:00 PDT
01 September 2023 at 19:00 PDT until 02 September 2023 at 01:00 PDT

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Identity Match
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup SIM Swap

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner in Germany is conducting an emergency maintenance from 30 August 2023 at 20:30 PDT until 30 August 2023 at 22:00 PDT.
During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS from Germany handsets to Subset of Shortcode.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 August 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 30 August 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from a subset of Twilio's France phone numbers

scheduled_maintenances.name: Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partners Three UK, H3G Austria, and Wind (Tre) Italy are conducting a planned maintenance from 05 September 2023 at 21:30 PDT until 06 September 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK, H3G Austria and Wind (Tre) Italy customers.

Impacted Products:
Verify Silent Network Auth - Three UK, H3G Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy
Lookup SIM Swap - Three UK, H3G Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy
Lookup Identity Match - Three UK, Wind (Tre) Italy
